
# Documenter.jl

### File-structure overview

```
Example/
├── Project.toml
├── README.md
├── LICENSE.md
├── src
│   ├── Example.jl
│   └── utilities.jl
└── docs
    ├── Project.toml
    ├── src
    │   ├── assets
    │   │   ├── favicon.ico
    │   │   └── logo.svg
    │   ├── index.md
    │   └── showcase.md
    └── make.jl
```

### The `make.jl` file 
```julia
using Documenter, Example
makedocs(
	sitename = "Example.jl",
	modules = [Example],
	pages = Any[
	    "Home" => "index.md",
	    "Showcase" => "showcase.md",
	],
)
```
### How to generate
 `julia --project=docs/ docs/make.jl` or `]activate docs/; include("make.jl")` or use `LiveServer.jl`
